participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: motivated and energetic, always looking for ways to inspire others.
participant_1.background: my parents were both very athletic. i'm a clean eater. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: ambitious and determined, but feels held back by external opinions.
participant_2.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.
